src:
Marcus Rashford Merasa Enjoy Dilatih Solskjaer
06 Nov 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah pengakuan diungkapkan oleh Marcus Rashford. Striker Manchester United itu merasa sangat nyaman dilatih oleh Ole Gunnar Solskjaer saat ini.
Sejak Desember 2018 kemarin, Solskjaer menduduki kursi pelatih Manchester United. Ia menggantikan sosok Jose Mourinho yang dipecat oleh manajemen Setan Merah.
Performa United di bawah kepemimpinan Solskjaer cenderung tidak stabil. Itulah mengapa mereka kini berada di papan tengah klasemen sementara EPL saat ini.
Rashford sendiri mengaku bahwa ia sangat menikmati dilatih oleh Solskjaer saat ini. "Saya sangat senang dilatih Ole saat ini," beber Rashford kepada Sky Sports.

Baca komentar lengkap sang striker di bawah ini.
text:
Marcus Rashford Feeling Enjoyed by Solskjaer
Nov 6 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A confession was expressed by Marcus Rashford. The Manchester United striker feels very comfortable being coached by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer at the moment.
Since December 2018 yesterday, Solskjaer has been in Manchester United's chair. He replaces the figure of Jose Mourinho who was fired by the management of the Red Devils.
United's performance under Solskjaer's leadership tends to be unstable. That is why they are now in the middle of the current EPL standings.
Rashford himself admitted that he really enjoyed being coached by Solskjaer at this time. "I am very happy to be trained by Ole at the moment," Rashford told Sky Sports.

Read the striker's full comments below.
